services.p1: We Provide Services As Per Your Requirements
services.p2: Idea that inspire, engage and excite
services.01_p: We are focused on using AI to make the world a smarter place by pushing innovations, finding technological solutions, and enacting AI routes.
services.02_p: Go through our digital transformation to give your vision the touch of the latest technology to exist in the world of modern digitalization and be part of a changing generation.
services.03_p: We help you discover the true value of data to obtain meaningful insights that would help you anticipate future outcomes by infusing intelligence into your day to day functionality.
services.04_p: We take care of everything from setting up your server to configuring it, securing it, and managing it so you can sit back and enjoy the results.
services.05_p: We provide quality software and web services that help you rediscover your business' image in the internet marketplace.
services.06_p: We develop all kinds of mobile applications, always upfront to challenge the latest trends. Get updated with us.
services.07_p: It's a world of e-commerce. We reimagine, reinvent and give new direction to the modern digital world. Trust us for your long run business and security for the long run.
services.08_p: We provide best-in-class enterprise web scraping solutions that can sift through data to create meaningful insights in a world where businesses are continuously looking for answers to new business problems.
services.09_p: To get a website online what you need is web hosting, without a web host there is no way out to actually access the website. Get your website done with our web host services- as good as it gets!
services.p4: We Develop Products That Are Reliable
services.p5: Our goal is to make the process easier for you. We provide our clients with the right tools for AI, digital transformation, web development, hosting, e-commerce and security

about.p4: Founded in 2019 with a sole purpose of delivering IT solutions to our clients
about.p7: Our team of developers are perfectionists who love what they do – What we do represents our technical, versatile, and integrated method as well as we assist our customers in achieving their goals.
about.p8: Let's talk about your project and see how we can work together
about.p9: As a leading IT company, we thrive on exceeding our clients' standards by transforming their concepts into beautiful products.
about.p10: Mr. Sharad Rai holds a Masters’ degree in international development from the University of Tokyo. Currently, he is pursuing PhD in Sustainability Science at the University of Tokyo. He started his career at SoftBank Corporation where he was involved in the new business development department working with Japanese and global startups. Born in a remote village near Mt. Everest in Nepal, he received government scholarship to study in one of the finest schools in the country when he was 10 years old. This changed his life. Therefore, in order to give back to his beloved country, he established two schools in his community where the future of more than 500 kids is being shaped today. He has also successfully established non-profit organizations in Nepal and Japan that have touched the lives of more than 20,000 students across Nepal. With a vision to contribute to Nepal’s economic growth by 1% in the future, he has built asha & company. Nepal being a landlocked country, traditional fields of industrialization such as manufacturing are not feasible.Thus, the country’s biggest strength is its people and their intelligence. By nurturing some of the top notch talents in Nepal, he aims to create a whole new research and consulting industry in the country. He currently divides his time between Tokyo and Nepal.

career.p4: Join the team to learn and grow in a fun and collaborative atmosphere. At Asha Inc, we are constantly working to ensure that our services are of the highest possible quality and reliability. We're always eager to meet new talent, so take a look at our open positions.
